name: Lady's Hentai Mosaic
description:
Lady's Hentai Mosaic is a game in which you need to correctly assemble a mosaic to restore the images of girls. In the course of passing the levels you will open up opportunities to remove more and more clothes from the girls.

Features:
  • Original hentai art
  • 4 modes of dress/undress
  • 100 achievements
  • Gallery mode
  • Relaxing music
